cf.Field.min¶

Field.min()[source]¶

The minimum of the data array.

See also

collapse, max, mean, mid_range, range, sample_size, sd, sum, var

Examples 1: 
>>> d = f.min()
Returns:
out : cf.Data

The minimum of the data array.
Examples 2: 
>>> f.data
<CF Data: [[[236.512756348, ..., 256.93371582]]] K>
>>> f.min()
<CF Data: 198.828598022 K>
